 ******************************************************************************************************************** */const replacements=[[/\*/g,'\\*','asterisks'],[/#/g,'\\#','number signs'],[/\//g,'\\/','slashes'],[/\(/g,'\\(','parentheses'],[/\)/g,'\\)','parentheses'],[/\[/g,'\\[','square brackets'],[/\]/g,'\\]','square brackets'],[/</g,'<','angle brackets'],[/>/g,'>','angle brackets'],[/_/g,'\\_','underscores'],[/`/g,'\\`','codeblocks'],[/\|/g,'\\|','pipes']];const escapeMarkdown=function(input){let skips=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:[];return replacements.reduce((str,replacement)=>{var name=replacement[2];return skips.indexOf(name)!==-1?str:str.replace(replacement[0],replacement[1]);},input);};export default escapeMarkdown;
